column4: ok I replaced all instances of warty with hoary, ran apt-get update, then upgrade. and its stil using the old kernel. any suggestions?
wil that also give me a graphical startup screen?
ok after doing this update, all my fonts changed
what did you do to get your fonts nicer ?
you should only have to update once really now
and even then if you installed from a 5.04 hoary final, that probably doesnt need much at all
I dont understand why you'd be updating so much
you only need to dist-upgrade once
ahh ok...well you shouldnt have many updates from now on
when you own 95+% of the world's desktops, you kinda dont need to go and get something else :)
why do they need to...they have no motivation lol :)
linux probably has more of a chance to give mac a run than ms
yes, install hoary first, then apt-get kubuntu-desktop
